reversals_or_updates.speaker: Marc the Shark

key_facts.fact: Ergo launched in 2019 with no pre-mine, no ICO, no VC funding and max supply of 97.7 million
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark

key_facts.fact: Block reward started at 75 or 60 ERG and is now down to 12 ERG with 2-minute block time
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark

key_facts.fact: Emission reduces every three months by 3 ERG: 9 to 6 to 3 ERG forever
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark

key_facts.fact: Current emission: 12 ERG = 8,640 ERG/day, 9 ERG = 6,400/day, 6 ERG = 4,300/day, 3 ERG = 2,160/day
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark

key_facts.fact: Autolykos requires 6 gigabyte VRAM minimum, 8 gigabyte plus optimal
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark

key_facts.fact: Most mining pools use PPLNS (pay per last N shares), Sigmonauts uses N = 0.5
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark

key_facts.fact: Sigmonauts mining pool has 10,000 ERG in treasury
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark

key_facts.fact: Storage rent is collected from unspent boxes older than 4 years
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark

key_facts.fact: Sigmonauts minimum payout threshold is 0.5 ERG
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark
